title: Hidden universe: the brain. Part 1
creator_credit: Tom Bywaters, American Broadcasting Company and CRM/McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Provides an overview of the functions of the brain, including motor control, memory and sensory perceptions. Shows doctors performing a craniotomy, probing different parts of the brain, and indicating the sensations that this causes. Discusses the separate functions of the left and right sides of the brain.
